data: ECHO-GL Liu et al. (2024a)
Heterogeneous graph learning from earnings call data
Dual-mechanism approach combining spatial relations with stock market dynamics
MGDPR You et al. (2024)
Modeling dynamic relationships using informational entropy
Multi-relational diffusion process with parallel retention
Consistent outperformance on NASDAQ, NYSE, Shanghai (2016-2023)
LARA Zeng et al. (2024)
Two-stage denoising framework with locality-aware attention
Iterative refinement labeling for noise reduction
Accuracy: 59,1 %. Improved gain/loss ratio on volatile markets
MANA-Net Wang et Ma (2024)
Market-news dynamic attention mechanism
Trainable opinion aggregation optimized for prediction
SH-Mix Jain et al. (2024)
Hierarchical multimodal augmentation strategy
Mode-specific and segment-based mixing techniques
Performance improvement: 3 to 7 % depending on tasks
SEP Koa et al. (2024a)
Self-reflective LLM framework for autonomous learning
Three-stage pipeline with PPO optimization
Superior performance in prediction and explanation quality
